page.title: 14Droitwich - Policeman's day
page.content: The Droitwich Police Station was built in 1977 and there have been no break ins.The station has 5 cells, 1 of which is a detention cell. The fastest car they own is the Jaguar which does 125-130 m.p.h. Other cars are a Rover BMW and a Cavalier. P.C.Styles goes to work at 8a.m.in the morning, spends half an hour in the station reading messages sent to the police station the night before.After, he goes patrolling on the main road, then goes to find people who have seen things about crimes that have happened. At 12.00 he goes round with Mr. Murray to deliver messages. After that he normally goes to talk with children. At 6p.m. he goes home for the night.
